global.description: Maintain inventory of product, services, and fixed asset in group, items and variant too, easy search with barcode, and

global.title: Multi-currency
global.description: Manage invoicing and payments seamlessly across 100+ currencies, with automatic currency conversion based on real-time exchange rates and

global.title: Reports
global.description: Access various reports like Trial balance, Profit & loss, Balance sheet, Daybook, Cash flow statement, Ledger, Sales bifurcation, Columnar report, Purchase register, Sales register, Inventory reports, Reverse charge report, Autopaid, Bill to bill report and

global.title: Real-time Dashboard
global.description: View visual representation of the company data like Total overdues, Profit & loss, Bank Account balances, and

global.title: Bank Reconciliation
global.description: Connect your bank account in Giddh, and with just one click, we will compare and match the transactions of your books with your bank account and

global.title: Manufacturing
global.description: Create manufacturing recipe, do manufacturing, add manufacturing expenses, and view its reports.

global.title: Bank Integrations
global.description: Provides support in 12+ countries including USA, Canada, UK, Germany, France, Netherlands, Ireland, Spain, Sweden, Denmark, Poland, Portugal

global.title: E-commerce Integration
global.description: Shopify integration to enhance the efficiency and growth of Ecommerce business.

global.title: Telecom Integration
global.description: MSG91 integration to automate the business communication like sending invoices, payment reminder and more via Mail, SMS, Whatsapp message.

global.title: Branch and warehouse management
global.description: Efficiently manage the company's numerous branches and warehouses, access branch- and warehouse-specific reports, facilitate branch transfers, archive the branch and warehouse and perform various related tasks.

global.title: Easy Import/Export of the data
global.description: Accelerate the accounting process by importing data such as company master information, inventory details, financial entries, bank statements, and other relevant data. Effortlessly export and share data, including ledgers, invoices, reports, and many more

global.title: Financial Year Locking
global.description: You have the ability to lock a specific financial year within your company, preventing any further entries or modifications during that period

global.title: Support
global.description: You are just one call or email away from us, Connect with us
